= HTTPie 比 cURL 更好用 =

https://httpie.io/doc#examples

例子
{{{
http post 'https://ng/api/person' name=q age:=0
http patch 'https://ng/api/person?id=eq.1' name=q
http patch 'https://ng/api/person?id=eq.1' age:=3
http patch https://ng/api/person id==eq.1 age:=3
}}}

httpie 还推荐了另一个工具：https://termible.io/，有空在弄。
